comments:

Right,
  Actually the method
   
      IFile file = CEditor.getInputFile()

should be deleted, there are no guaranties that the CEditor is actaully
working on a IFile/resource.

Mark deprecated and to be remove after release of CDT-3.0
Fix in the head.  Please verify when you have the chance.
